data.name: Join
data.value: Join

data.name: IndexReady
data.value: You are ready to talk in Spanish, English or the language you want!

data.name: IndexTeacherSubscribe
data.value: We are working on amazing tools for you! Send us your email address and we will keep you informed about new updates

data.name: IndexTeacherTitle
data.value: Are you a teacher?

data.name: IndexAlreadySubscribed
data.value: You are already subscribed

data.name: IndexTeacherSubscribeConfirm
data.value: Thanks for your interest in next Langademy updates for teachers. If you have any suggestions or doubts don't hesitate to contact us at contact@langademy.com. We will keep you informed!

data.name: IndexFooterSt1
data.value: Now you are ready!

data.name: IndexFooterSt2
data.value: When you complete the registration form, you will be able to upload your profile picture, add more languages and fill in the rest of your profile

data.name: IndexFooterSt3
data.value: Then check the scheduled meetups and join or create your own

data.name: IndexFooterSt4
data.value: If you have any doubt, send us a message from your Conversations Panel. We will be happy to help you

data.name: IndexLogoAlt
data.value: Join Langademy, your language exchange community

data.name: IndBlock2SubBlock1Text
data.value: If you don’t have time for language exchanges, don’t worry. At Langademy you will find native speakers with the best rates of the language market to practice languages when you want

data.name: IndBlock2SubBlock1Title
data.value: Do you have a busy schedule?

data.name: IndBlock2SubBlock2Text
data.value: Speak in your native language and we will give you the same amount of time to practice other languages. Make conversation exchange your trade!

data.name: IndBlock2SubBlock2Title
data.value: Language exchange

data.name: IndBlock2SubBlock3
data.value: Sign up and start learning languages

data.name: IndBlock2Subtitle
data.value: Learn spanish, german, english, french or any language online with Langademy. In Langademy's chat rooms you can find native speakers to chat or make online videocalls in your favourite languages

data.name: IndBlock2Title
data.value: Do you want to learn a language?

data.name: IndBlock3Step1
data.value: Add credits to your Langademy Wallet

data.name: IndBlock3Step2
data.value: Enter the Wallet Chatroom of your language choice

data.name: IndBlock3Step3
data.value: Chat with native speakers (for free), check their reputation and their rates for private videocalls

data.name: IndBlock3Step4
data.value: Start a videocall with your chosen native speaker and have fun (ALWAYS!)

data.name: IndBlock3Text1
data.value: The perfect solution for those who don't look for a teacher but want to practice a language and have no time for language exchange

data.name: IndBlock3Text2
data.value: Learn more about Langademy Wallet

data.name: IndBlock3Text3
data.value: Earn money from home speaking in your native language

data.name: IndBlock3Title
data.value: If you don't have time for language exchange...

data.name: IndBlock4Block2Text
data.value: Sometimes meeting people at the time you want isn’t easy. Create meetups to exchange languages when you want and let the language community know about it

data.name: IndBlock4Block2Title
data.value: Practice the language you want, when you want

data.name: IndBlock4Block3Text
data.value: Money isn't necessary to learn a language at Langademy. Timebanking to the rescue! Talk to others in your native language, and we will give you the same amount of time to practice foreign languages.

data.name: IndBlock4Block3Title
data.value: Learn languages for free

data.name: IndBlock4Text1
data.value: This is your place if you want to practice foreign languages for free. Find conversation exchange partners and improve your language skills by texting or making online video calls with them

data.name: IndBlock4Title
data.value: Language Exchange

data.name: IndSubTitle
data.value: Make online videocalls with native speakers all over the world and practice foreign languages when you want

data.name: IndTitlePart1
data.value: Learn languages

data.name: IndTitlePart2
data.value: with native speakers online

data.name: Login
data.value: Login

data.name: IndLanguages
data.value: Languages

data.name: IndBlock3LinkText
data.value: Learn more about language exchanges
